{{Wired embedded system |brand=PC-Engines |model=apu |revision=.1d |manuf_country=Switzerland |is_manuf=Yes |est_release_date=04/2014 |type=Router Firewall |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=AMD |cpu1_model=GET40E;GET40EFSB22GV; |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L1606EM2I-12G |fla2=8 GiB |fla2_brand=Varies |fla2_model=SD Card |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G83AFR-PBC |ram1_num=8 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCIe, mSATA, SATA |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 16-pin header,, unpopulated,, J13 |serial=yes,, console (DE-9),, (115200 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8111E |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8111E |eth_chip3_brand=Realtek |eth_chip3_model=RTL8111E |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |flags=RTC w/ battery, SIM Card slot, SD Card slot, UART, I2C, GPIO, buzzer, heatsink, metal case |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, pfSense, IPFire }} {{TagLine|PC Engines apu.1d}} :[https://www.pcengines.ch/apu1d.htm Product Page]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[AMD]] G series T40E @1.0GHz Dual-core 64bit X86 *Storage: 2MB SPI Flash, 8GB SD Card, mSATA, SATA *Memory: 2GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 3x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 host port *PCI: 2x Mini PCIe slots *Power: 12V, 2A via barrel
